title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, April 16, 2015
teaser: Airing on Thursday, April 16, 2015:  The finance minister of debt-burdened Greece is in Washington today for a round of meetings that includes some face time with President Obama. Yanis Varoufakis has new trouble today, after a downgrade for his country's debt. More on that. Biking to work is cool and doesn't burn fossil fuel unless you ate fossil fuel for breakfast. But we should remember that many people have to bike if they can't afford the car, the insurance, the parking. A new program in Savannah, Georgia is helping people in the second group get the bikes they need.

byline: Elaine Jones, Adam Allington, Stan Alcorn, Tony Wagner, Beidi Zhang, Dan Weissmann and David Brancaccio
